fabric.description: For cold-weather cardio, complete with a compressive-yet-stretchy feel that dries fast while wicking away sweat.

pdp.subtitle: Our warmest legging for cold-weather cardio. Made in supportive, sweat-wicking FrostKnit. Featuring an internal drawstring, reflective details, and a peachy-soft, second-skin feel.

productKnowledges.title: Description
productKnowledges.description: Our warmest legging for cold-weather cardio. Made in supportive, sweat-wicking FrostKnit. Featuring an internal drawstring, reflective details, and a peachy-soft, second-skin feel.

productKnowledges.title: Ideal For
productKnowledges.description: Medium to high-sweat Recreation — think cold-weather cardio like running, hiking, and cross-country skiing.

productKnowledges.title: Other Fabric Details
productKnowledges.description: - FrostKnit fabric is brushed on the inside to provide extra warmth & next-to-skin comfort

properties.description: Our warmest legging for cold-weather cardio. Made in supportive, sweat-wicking FrostKnit. Featuring an internal drawstring, reflective details, and a peachy-soft, second-skin feel.
